items.title: 2026’s Biggest Marketing Trend Is Already Dominating the College Bowl Games

items.title: This Automaker Just Overtook Tesla as the Top EV Seller in 2025

items.title: Users Slam Duolingo for Sneaky Ads on iPhones—Can Apple Ban the App?
items.description: The language-learning app’s ads are starting to feel inescapable for some users.
